oa:formattedText.text: UPDATE: Select CPD Papers are now ordered through a punchout catalog. If the item you order returns this error message: "No Results Found", proceed to "SUPPLIER WEBSITE CATALOGS (Punchouts)" and then click on "CPD Store Supplies" or "RPC Supplies" to place an order instead of searching by iPro #. For further information regarding CPD paper ordering process changes, reference the Inventory Supply Sheet found on the Store Portal.
